```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(RColorBrewer)
GDP<-read_csv("GDPpercapita.csv")
hivprev<-read_csv("hivprevalence.csv")

tb<- read.csv("indicator_estimated incidence infectious tb per 100000.csv") 

tb<-tb%>%
  gather(key=Year,
         value=Infected,
         X1990:X2007)
tb<-tb%>%
  mutate(
    Year=parse_number(Year)
  )


GDP<-GDP%>%gather(key="year", value="gdp", -1) %>% filter(gdp != 0) %>% filter(year>1990) %>% filter(year<2008)%>%group_by(Country) 

GDP_tb<-left_join(tb,GDP)
#View(GDP_tb)
```
